data.message:
Dear facebook dev.
Im not good in english but ill try my best. I just need help to recover my account Mark Russel M. Fabre that has been hacked.. he change the name it is Jarren V. Fenkaze now with a saitama anime profile pic. . Another problem is I dont remember the password of my  yahoo mail account... maybe you can make another option to recover my account

replies.message: Hey Mark. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. If you're still having trouble, we can help you recover your account here: http://bit.ly/2yNIx6N. -Kiara
